name: DRAW/AI! | Draw and Guess !
description:
✏️🤖
Will artificial intelligence be able to recognize your drawings? Artificial intelligence challenges you! 😉

You don't need to be able to draw in this game, just try it and see! You will love this addicting game! ❤️

The game has several modes: 🔀

1. Competitive mode with a leaderboard, you will need to draw as many as possible within a minute!
2. Standard mode, where you need to draw the specified drawings in 20 seconds!

🏁
The leaderboard will give you the opportunity to get ahead! Draw faster and the result will not keep you waiting!

📊
Reach and compete! A unique achievement system will help you with this!

This game will especially appeal to those who are interested in AI, love to draw and learn new things! 🙌

The game is great for developing thinking. 🧠

Family friendly. 🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫✌

A wonderful voice assistant will recognize your drawings! 🎤

Get started now! ✌
